survey_name: Urban Bike Share Program User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of urban bike share programs to improve service quality, accessibility, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban bike share program?

questions.question_text: What is your primary purpose for using the bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is your primary purpose for using the bike share program?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your preferred stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction questions to measure intensity of feelings.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your preferred stations?

questions.question_text: What features would improve your bike share experience? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse improvement needs.

script.question_text: What features would improve your bike share experience? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving the urban bike share program.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving the urban bike share program.
